features.name: Live Commerce Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard displaying stock grid with color-coded availability status, live chat panel, and real-time statistics for Facebook/YouTube Live commerce management

features.name: Real-Time Chat Integration
features.description: YouTube Live chat fetching and display with intelligent filtering, cross-device sync via Firebase, and session-based history management

features.name: Automated Stock Management
features.description: Real-time stock cutting system that automatically deducts stock when customers type confirmation codes (CF, item numbers), with multi-buy support and admin proxy booking

features.name: Hybrid TTS System
features.description: Advanced text-to-speech engine with smart switching between Google Cloud TTS (Neural2) and Native Browser TTS, with automatic fallback and iPad/iOS optimization

features.name: Voice Price Detection
features.description: AI-powered audio processing that detects price announcements from live stream audio and displays them in real-time with history tracking

features.name: Sound Effects System
features.description: Audio feedback system with distinct sound effects for success (ka-ching) and error/sold-out (buzzer) events

features.name: Chat History Management
features.description: Session-based chat history with pagination, load more functionality, and export to CSV capability

features.name: Header Navigation
features.description: Application header with navigation controls, TTS toggle, away mode, and system settings

features.name: Live Overlay Display
features.description: Overlay component showing live stream information and statistics

features.name: Nickname Management
features.description: Customer nickname storage and custom override system integrated with Firebase

features.name: Auto Cleanup System
features.description: Automatic cleanup of old chat messages and stock data with configurable retention periods

features.name: Away Mode
features.description: Auto-pause functionality when user is away or inactive to conserve resources

features.name: Pull to Refresh
features.description: Touch-based pull-to-refresh functionality optimized for mobile and tablet devices

features.name: Firebase Integration
features.description: Firebase Realtime Database connection and authentication for cross-device data synchronization

features.name: PWA Support
features.description: Progressive Web App capabilities with service worker, offline caching, and update prompts
